java/liquibase/parser/visitor/ValidatingVisitor.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.visitor;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00005 import liquibase.RanChangeSet;
00006 import liquibase.change.Change;
00007 import liquibase.database.Database;
00008 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.SetupException;
00010 import liquibase.preconditions.AndPrecondition;
00011 import liquibase.preconditions.FailedPrecondition;
00012 
00013 import java.util.ArrayList;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.List;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00018 public class ValidatingVisitor implements ChangeSetVisitor {
00019 
00020     private List<ChangeSet> invalidMD5Sums = new ArrayList<ChangeSet>();
00021     private List<FailedPrecondition> failedPreconditions = new ArrayList<FailedPrecondition>();
00022     private Set<ChangeSet> duplicateChangeSets = new HashSet<ChangeSet>();
00023     private List<SetupException> setupExceptions = new ArrayList<SetupException>();
00024 
00025     private Set<String> seenChangeSets = new HashSet<String>();
00026 
00027     private List<RanChangeSet> ranChangeSets;
00028 
00029     public ValidatingVisitor(List<RanChangeSet> ranChangeSets) {
00030         this.ranChangeSets = ranChangeSets;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public void checkPreconditions(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) {
00034         try {
00035             AndPrecondition precondition = changeLog.getPreconditions();
00036             if (precondition == null) {
00037                 return;
00038             }
00039             precondition.check(database, changeLog);
00040         } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00041             failedPreconditions.addAll(e.getFailedPreconditions());
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     public Direction getDirection() {
00046         return ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.FORWARD;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public void visit(ChangeSet changeSet) {
00050         for (Change change : changeSet.getChanges()) {
00051             try {
00052                 change.setUp();
00053             } catch (SetupException se) {
00054                 setupExceptions.add(se);
00055             }
00056         }
00057 
00058         for (RanChangeSet ranChangeSet : ranChangeSets) {
00059             if (ranChangeSet.getId().equals(changeSet.getId())
00060                     && ranChangeSet.getAuthor().equals(changeSet.getAuthor())
00061                     && ranChangeSet.getChangeLog().equals(changeSet.getFilePath())) {
00062                 if (ranChangeSet.getMd5sum() != null && !ranChangeSet.getMd5sum().equals(changeSet.getMd5sum())) {
00063                     invalidMD5Sums.add(changeSet);
00064                 }
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         String changeSetString = changeSet.toString(false);
00069         if (seenChangeSets.contains(changeSetString)) {
00070             duplicateChangeSets.add(changeSet);
00071         } else {
00072             seenChangeSets.add(changeSetString);
00073         }
00074     }
00075 
00076     public List<ChangeSet> getInvalidMD5Sums() {
00077         return invalidMD5Sums;
00078     }
00079 
00080 
00081     public List<FailedPrecondition> getFailedPreconditions() {
00082         return failedPreconditions;
00083     }
00084 
00085 
00086     public Set<ChangeSet> getDuplicateChangeSets() {
00087         return duplicateChangeSets;
00088     }
00089 
00090     public List<SetupException> getSetupExceptions() {
00091         return setupExceptions;
00092     }
00093 
00094     public boolean validationPassed() {
00095         return invalidMD5Sums.size() == 0
00096                 && failedPreconditions.size() == 0
00097                 && duplicateChangeSets.size() == 0
00098                 && setupExceptions.size() == 0;
00099     }
00100 
00101 }
